#summary How to install and run OntoUML Editor.
#labels Phase-Deploy

Pre-requisite: a working JRE.

=Installing the plugin=
1. Download the Eclipse Modeling Tools package for your OS: http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
2. Download ontouml.zip from the download section of this site.
3. Unzip the Eclipse package.
4. Unzip ontouml.zip on the "dropins" folder which is inside the just created main Eclipse folder.
5. Execute Eclipse! 

=Creating a model=
Click in File -> New -> Example -> OntoUML Diagram.

Thank you for using OntoUML Editor!
